name: Sweet Boom
description:
Survive a Deadly Race! Dont be left behind or you will explode, sweetly.  

2d Pixel arte game - Top View - Local Multiplayer (4 players) 

Keyboard 1: up (acelerate), left, right, enter (shoot). 

Keyboard 2: W (acelarate), A (left), D (right), E (shoot). 

To play another cars,  only with usb controls.

Don't be left behind, the screen is the limit for your survival. 

Make them eat your dust... or dunuts.
